title: Talking Hometowns with Bryan & Garrett
description:
It’s bae day! Bryan Abasolo and Garrett Yrigoyen join Rachel and Becca in the studio to discuss Peter’s dramatic hometowns. Plus, they reveal how they would have handled the Victoria F. situation.

Then, Bryan and Garrett recall their hometowns with Rachel and Becca and share some moments we didn’t see on the show.

Be sure to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.

Thanks to our sponsors:
